chat.title: AI Chat
chat.subtitle: Chat with AI Health Assistant
chat.welcomeDescription: You can ask any health, diet, or exercise related questions
chat.configureAI: Please configure the chat model in settings first

general.name: General Assistant
general.title: SnapFit AI Health Assistant
general.description: Comprehensive health management assistant that can answer various health-related questions

nutrition.name: Nutritionist
nutrition.title: Registered Dietitian (RD)
nutrition.description: Specialized in macronutrient ratios, dietary structure optimization, and nutrient density analysis

exercise.name: Exercise Expert
exercise.title: SF Certified Exercise Physiologist
exercise.description: Specialized in exercise prescription design, energy metabolism optimization, and training plan development

metabolism.name: Metabolism Expert
metabolism.title: Metabolic Endocrinology PhD
metabolism.description: Specialized in basal metabolism, thermic effect of food, and precise analysis of metabolic syndrome

behavior.name: Behavior Expert
behavior.title: Behavioral Psychology Expert
behavior.description: Specialized in health behavior change, habit formation, and scientific methods for motivation maintenance

timing.name: Timing Expert
timing.title: Chrono-nutrition Expert
timing.description: Specialized in biological rhythms, nutrient timing, and sleep-metabolism coordination optimization

systemPrompts.general:
You are SnapFit AI, an experienced health management consultant. I have comprehensive knowledge in nutrition, exercise science, and behavioral psychology.

My mission is to help users achieve their health goals, whether it's weight loss, muscle building, fitness improvement, or developing healthy habits. I will:

🎯 **My Expertise**:
- Comprehensive analysis of users' nutrition, exercise, and metabolic data
- Provide balanced and practical health advice
- Help develop sustainable health plans
- Answer various health questions

💬 **My Communication Style**:
- Communicate with users in a gentle and encouraging tone
- Explain complex health knowledge in simple and understandable ways
- Provide personalized advice based on users' actual data
- Always prioritize users' health and safety

Please tell me your health concerns or goals, and I will provide the most suitable advice based on your data!

profile.title: Personal Information
profile.description: Update your personal information, this data will be used to calculate calorie consumption and provide personalized recommendations
profile.activityLevelDescription: Set your usual activity level. This setting will be used as the default activity level for new dates, or as a fallback when you haven't specified an activity level for a specific date on the homepage.
profile.bmrFormulaDescription: Choose the formula used to calculate Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR).
profile.bmrCalculationBasisDescription: Choose whether to use total body weight or lean body mass when calculating BMR. The latter is usually more accurate, but requires you to provide body fat percentage.
profile.leanBodyMass: Based on Lean Body Mass (requires body fat %)
profile.bodyFatDescription: Please enter your body fat percentage. For example, enter 15 for 15%.
profile.bmrFormulaDescription: Choose the formula used to calculate Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR).
profile.leanBodyMass: Based on Lean Body Mass (requires body fat %)
profile.bmrBasisDescription: Choose whether to use total weight or lean body mass for BMR calculation. The latter is usually more accurate but requires you to provide body fat percentage.
profile.bodyFatDescription: Please enter your body fat percentage. For example, enter 15 for 15%.

goals.title: Health Goals

data.title: Data Management
data.description: Export or import your health data, or clear all data
data.exportDescription: Export all your health data as a JSON file for backup or migration
data.importDescription: Import health data from a previously exported JSON file
data.clearDescription: Clear all health log data, this operation cannot be undone
data.confirmClearDescription: This operation will permanently delete all health log data and cannot be recovered. Are you sure you want to continue?
data.exportSuccessDescription: Your health data has been exported as a JSON file
data.exportErrorDescription: Unable to export your health data
data.importErrorDescription: Unable to import your health data, please ensure the file format is correct

about.title: About & Help
about.privacyDescription: All data in this application is stored locally in your browser and will not be uploaded to any server. Communication with AI models is only used to process your input and generate recommendations, and will not store your personal data.
about.usage1: Record your diet and exercise on the homepage
about.usage2: Use text input or upload images to add records
about.usage3: Chat with AI assistant on the intelligent conversation page to get health advice
about.usage4: Set your model parameters on the AI configuration page
about.usage5: Regularly export your data to prevent data loss
